page.title: 09Parish News Letter, Bodenham
page.content:
Vicar - Rev. D C Miller. Dated July 1985 " It was a great pleasure for me to present to the Bishop nineteen young adults for Confirmation last month. It was good to see them so full of health and vitality, putting them selves on the side of God and good and committing themselves to fight against evil."
"The floor in Bodenham church has been badly affected by woodworm. The P.C.C. has decided to have the floor treated, sanded, and sealed. During this work the church will be closed, from Monday 22nd of July to Wednesday 14th August. Services will be held as usual in our other churches and I hope the Bodenham congregation will attend them." "Bodenham Fete: Saturday 13th July, at 2.30 p.m. at Siward James Close."
